text.textblock: In accordance with the Federal Advisory Committee Act (Public Law 92-463, as amended), the National Science Foundation announces the following meeting.
February 9 & 10, 1994; 8 a.m. to 6 p.m. each day.
Room 360; National Science Foundation; 4201 Wilson Boulevard; Arlington, VA 22230.
Open to the public. Persons may participate in the meeting as time and space permit.

Dr. James F. Hays, Division Director, Division of Earth Sciences, room 785, National Science Foundation, Arlington, VA 22230 (703) 306-1550; and Donald W. Klick, ICG/CSD Executive Secretary, 922 National Center, U.S. Geological Survey, Reston, VA 22092, (703) 648-6346.
May be obtained from the Contact Person(s) listed above.

Briefings on accomplishments, current activities, and future plans of the DOE, NSF, and USGS CSD programs; discussions of recommendations for organizational structure, procedures, schedule, and related matters for the U.S. CSDP overview by the Council for CSD.

doctitle.textblock: DOE/USGS/NSF Council for Continental Scientific Drilling; Meeting
